trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be suspended in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may suspend the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]工作流实例可能在三种方式之一挂起︰ 宿主可能调用<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>、<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>可能从工作流实例内部调用活动或工作流运行时引擎挂起工作流实例。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 当挂起工作流实例时，工作流运行时引擎将引发<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 主机可以通过将事件处理程序添加到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>订阅此事件

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 获取工作流实例挂起原因的说明。

trans-unit.source: If the host suspends the workflow instance, it supplies a reason for the suspension in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果宿主将挂起工作流实例，它会提供在挂起的原因`string`到<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>参数

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is suspended by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, the reason is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如果挂起工作流<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>活动，原因提供<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the workflow runtime engine supplies a reason for the suspension.
trans-unit.target: 否则，工作流运行时引擎将提供挂起的原因。

trans-unit.source: The description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 工作流实例挂起原因的说明。
